SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.clientonserver

Class ClientSocket

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.clientonserver.ClientSocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
Client
public class ClientSocket extends Object implements Client
This object is used on the server to send updates to a specific client. This object is used on the server to create the messages and send them over a tcp tunnel.

    • putIntoShelf

      public void putIntoShelf(String player, int column, Tile tile)
      This method is used when a player inserts a single tile into his shelf. It is used to send the message to the remote view of the client in order to insert the tile into the shelf.

      Parameters:
